relation: A Normal-type attack. Also used for cutting small bushes to open new paths.
Cuts the foe with sharp scythes, claws, etc.* Attacks the foe with sharp blades or claws.*
A basic attack. It can be used to cut down thin trees and grass.
Cuts the target with sharp scythes, claws, etc.
The foe is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.
The target is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.
The target is cut with a scythe or claw. This can also be used to cut down thin trees.
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Cut (move)" - Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia
textBeforeTable: Description Cut can no longer remove tall grass. Generation IV and on A Pokémon using Cut can remove a certain type of tree, which acts as an obstacle between the player and their destination. It can also be used to cut tall grass. In Pokémon Emerald, a Pokémon with Hyper Cutter can cut a larger area of tall grass around the user. Generation I-III Outside of battle Cut inflicts damage and has no secondary effect.
